mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectMbrBnefDetail Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ BNEF_SN , BNEF_DETAIL_TURN , BNEF_TP_CD , BNEF_BEG_DT , BNEF_END_DT , APRV_SECT_CD , APRV_ADMIN_ID , APRV_DT , STPGE_ADMIN_ID , STPGE_DT , STPGE_RESN_CONT , PYMNT_RESN_DSCR , PYMNT_PSB_COUNT , PRM_NO , PNT_AMT , PNT_APL_RESN_CD , WEBPNT_AMT , WEBPNT_VALID_DAYCNT , WEBPNT_RESN_CD , WEBPNT_DETAIL_RESN_CD , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM MBR_BNEF_DETAIL WHERE 1 = 1 AND BNEF_SN = #{bnefSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND BNEF_DETAIL_TURN = #{bnefDetailTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
